Documentation for this format

name: AdverseEventMitigation
title: Adverse Event Mitigation
description: Details about an action taken to mitigate or manage the adverse event.

element.definition: Details about an action taken to mitigate or manage the adverse event.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
If the mitigation category is 'Drug', then only mitigation drug must be specified.
constraint.expression: extension('category').valueCodeableConcept.coding.code = 'C49158' implies (extension('drug').exists() and not extension('procedure').exists() and not extension('adjustment').exists())

constraint.human: If the mitigation category is 'Adjustment', then only mitigation adjustment must be specified.
constraint.expression: extension('category').valueCodeableConcept.coding.code = 'C49157' implies (extension('adjustment').exists() and not extension('procedure').exists() and not extension('drug').exists())

constraint.human: If the mitigation category is 'Procedure', then only mitigation procedure must be specified.
constraint.expression: extension('category').valueCodeableConcept.coding.code = 'C49159' implies (extension('procedure').exists() and not extension('adjustment').exists() and not extension('drug').exists())

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

Must have either extensions or value[x], not both
